title: The 9 year old Google Nexus 7 2013 can now run Android 12L unofficially
content:
The stable release of Android 12L has only been out for two weeks now, yet weâ€™ve seen an amazing amount of development from the aftermarket modding community already. There exists a working port for the Google Pixel 6 series, and even a custom GSI build for Project Treble-enabled devices. As the days go by, this

The post The 9 year old Google Nexus 7 2013 can now run Android 12L unofficially appeared first on xda-developers.
description: An unofficial port of LineageOS 19.1 based on Android 12L is now available for the Google Nexus 7 2013 tablet. Give it a go!
